priceSection.title: Our Prices
priceSection.description: To provide a professional price quote, Maraaj Al Mabani conducts a comprehensive study in three main stages.
priceSection.stage1DescriptionLong: In this stage, we study the technical details of the project, including plans and specifications.
priceSection.stage2DescriptionLong: In this stage, the project budget is determined based on material details and specifications.
priceSection.stage3DescriptionLong: In this stage, project execution begins according to the specified plans, and the final project is delivered.
priceSection.contact: Contact us now to know the best price offer for your project!

aboutUs.title: Who Are We?
aboutUs.description1: Maraaj Al Mabani United was established in 2000, a Saudi company specializing in contracting. We execute all construction, architectural, and electromechanical works. The company provides integrated services in project management and execution.
aboutUs.description2: We are committed to adopting ideas and turning them into tangible reality with the highest quality standards, in accordance with international specifications and the Saudi Building Code.

experience.title: Experience Makes Us Confident
experience.description: More than 20 years of experience in providing high-quality contracting services.

expertise.title: At Marjea Al-Mabani United Company,
expertise.subtitle: we are committed to
expertise.description: More than 20 years of experience in providing contracting services with quality and professionalism, making us your trusted partner in project execution.
expertise.service1: Follow-up and Supervision of Your Project
expertise.service1Description: We ensure your comfort and peace of mind about the progress of your project. Therefore, we regularly inform you about the project stages.
expertise.service2Description: We offer clarity and responsibility. If we agree with you on a specific budget that matches your needs, we ensure to meet the requirements to complete the project until turnkey delivery.
expertise.service3Description: We provide our clients with comfort by delivering all their construction needs from excavation to turnkey delivery with the best quality, lowest cost, and fastest execution.

name: Khaled Badr Al-Din
quote: Since the establishment of Marja' Al-Mabani United Company in 2000, I have been committed to working with dedication and sincerity, attracting the best qualified talents, and training and developing the promising youth from our nation to enhance their practical skills. This foundation has been crucial in achieving my ambitions, and with God's grace, this entity continues to thrive, becoming one of the key players in community development and construction.
description: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering and Communications, Master's degree in Engineering Systems and Information Management, with a career that spans multiple positions in both the public and private sectors. In 2000, I founded my own business in Jeddah, driven by my passion and vision. I am known for my creativity, innovation, and flexibility in providing solutions.
